items.question: Why did the movie never show his older sister, only his younger brother Harold? His sister was born in 1916, Desmond in 1919, and Harold in 1921.
What did Sergeant Howell mean during the interview with Doss on the battlefield when he said that he wants "a morphine or a bullet"?
items.answer: He meant that the pain he was experiencing was so great that he wanted it to end as soon as possible, either through a morphine injection or through death.

spoilerItems.question: When the Japanese soldiers were killing the wounded American soldiers, why did they use the bayonets instead of just shooting them?
spoilerItems.answer: Bayonets do not need ammunition. Whereas shooting living or already dead bodies would use ammunition that could be needed later.
